name: EVANSVILLE WESTERN RAILWAY
description: STB Class II freight railroad providing common carrier service to s. Indiana and Illinois
sampleDescriptions: Support for FY2018 U.S. DOT TIGER, INFRA grant proposals by Indiana DOT, and future CRISI grant opportunities in Indiana.
H.R 721 - support for enactment of the Building Rail Access for Customers and the Economy Act or the BRACE Act to make permanent the Section 45G tax credit.
No bill number - Congressional support and education regarding the implementation of a previously awarded US DOT TIGER grant to Indiana DOT for the reconstruction of the Maunie Railroad Bridge.
